ygData.subject: Re: faction
ygData.msgSnippet: No it won t. I participated in a Guild war and killed two PCs and suffered a faction hit. I can no longer purchase items in Felwithe as a result. Bug still
ygData.messageBody:
No it won't. I participated in a Guild war and killed two PCs and suffered a
faction hit. I can no longer purchase items in Felwithe as a result. Bug
still exists in program.

-----Original Message-----
From: Wizard <wizard@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 21, 1999 5:19 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] faction


>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
>Faction hit will be fine out of arenas, duels and guild war !!!
>
>
>
>At 09.07 21/06/99 +0200, you wrote:
>>From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
>>
>>According to Tom Bratina:
>>> update... i just read a post on stratics that says u can lose faction on
all
>>> of the servers by killing other PC's (ie. duels). it says after 5-7 PC
>>> kills, their faction standing went from indifferent to dubious. A few
more,
>>> and they will be KOS (threatingly is after dubious, and they will attack
if
>>> conned threatingly).
>>
>>Yes. I do expect this to disappear, since a few PC festivals and other
dueling
>>events have already been cancelled, since the participants definitively do
>>*not* want faction hits, and I can understand this. Verant will not
implement
>>something that would hamper socialisation.
>>
>>--
>>Vincent ARCHER -=-=- Herve Schauer Consultants -=-=- archer@...
>>Tel: +33 1 41 40 97 00 Fax: +33 1 41 40 97 09
>> 01 41 40 97 00 01 41 40 97 09
>>
